author: nhcwebmaster@noaa.gov (NHC Webmaster)
nhc_headline: ...ADDITIONAL TROPICAL STORM WATCHES ISSUED FOR PORTIONS OF THE NORTHERN LEEWARD ISLANDS...
summary: ...ADDITIONAL TROPICAL STORM WATCHES ISSUED FOR PORTIONS OF THE NORTHERN LEEWARD ISLANDS... As of 8:00 PM AST Tue Oct 07 the center of Jerry was located near 12.2, -47.5 with movement W at 23 mph. The minimum central pressure was 1003 mb with maximum sustained winds of about 50 mph.

summary_detail.value: ...ADDITIONAL TROPICAL STORM WATCHES ISSUED FOR PORTIONS OF THE NORTHERN LEEWARD ISLANDS... As of 8:00 PM AST Tue Oct 07 the center of Jerry was located near 12.2, -47.5 with movement W at 23 mph. The minimum central pressure was 1003 mb with maximum sustained winds of about 50 mph.

title: Summary - Tropical Storm Jerry (AT5/AL102025)
